item.name:
Area

Represents the concept of an area, such as a river or city which has devices. Areas can contain other areas to potentially even represent a country and its various divisions
Displays a listing of all areas paginated

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed area objects utilising fractal to provide include and pagination capabilities

item.name: Displays a single area's data request via its id

request.description: Returns a transformed item of the area model utilising fractal to provide include capatabilities

item.name:
Area/Device

This is the subresource of all devices belonging to a supplied area.
Displays a listing of all devices belonging to the supplied area paginated

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed device objects belonging to the supplied area utilising fractal to provide include and pagination capabilities

item.name:
Area/Error

This is the subresource of all errors belonging to a supplied area. An error belongs to an area if it belongs to a device in the area.
Displays a listing of all an areas errors paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed error points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities

item.name: Displays a listing of all an areas errors grouped into hourly points paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed error points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities. Each of the points are made through averaging together points occupying the grouped time interval.

item.name: Displays a listing of all an areas errors grouped into daily points paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed error points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities. Each of the points are made through averaging together points occupying the grouped time interval.

item.name: Displays a listing of all an areas errors grouped into weekly points paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed error points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities. Each of the points are made through averaging together points occupying the grouped time interval.

item.name: Displays a listing of all an areas errors grouped into monthly points paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed error points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities. Each of the points are made through averaging together points occupying the grouped time interval.

item.name: Displays a listing of all an areas errors grouped into yearly points paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed error points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities. Each of the points are made through averaging together points occupying the grouped time interval.

item.name:
Area/Reading

This is the subresource of all readings belonging to a supplied area. A reading belongs to an area if it belongs to a device in the area.
Displays a listing of all an areas readings paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed reading points, belonging to the requested area's devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities

item.name: Displays a listing of all an areas readings grouped into hourly points paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed reading points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities. Each of the points are made through averaging together points occupying the grouped time interval.

item.name: Displays a listing of all an areas readings grouped into daily points paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed reading points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities. Each of the points are made through averaging together points occupying the grouped time interval.

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed reading points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities. Each of the points are made through averaging together points occupying the grouped time interval.

item.name: Displays a listing of all an areas readings grouped into monthly points paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed reading points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities. Each of the points are made through averaging together points occupying the grouped time interval.

item.name: Displays a listing of all an areas readings grouped into yearly points paginated in divisons of 500

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed reading points, belonging to the requested areas devices, utilising fractal to provide include capabilities. Each of the points are made through averaging together points occupying the grouped time interval.

item.name:
Device

Each Device represents a different flood sensor in the network
Displays a listing of all devices paginated

request.description: Displays a listing of transformed device objects utilising fractal to provide include and pagination capabilities

item.name: Displays a single device's data request via its id

request.description: Returns a transformed item of the device model utilising fractal to provide include capatabilities
